definition: new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
vocabulary words (in language-learning books)/new or unfamiliar words

sentences.chinese: 记住这个生词表中的单词。

sentences.english: You can try to understand the new words with your dictionary. Also, you can discuss this with your neighour. Let's begin.
sentences.chinese: 学生通过查字典和同学之间相互讨论进行生词的学习。

sentences.english: Have you previewed the daily new words?
sentences.chinese: 每天的生词你预习了吗？

sentences.english: We should form the habit of referring to a dictionary when meeting new words.
sentences.chinese: 我们遇到生词应养成查字典的习惯。

sentences.english: Although there's no new word in the passage, I can't understand it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这篇短文中没有生词，我却仍没有读懂。

sentences.english: When I got home she began to review the new words in lesson 111.
sentences.chinese: 当我回到家时，她开始复习第一百一十一课的生词了。

sentences.english: For the first list, I was able to recall only 12 %.
sentences.chinese: 第一张生词表，我只记起其中12%的单词的意思。

sentences.english: English has a lot of words which are made by composition and derivation.
sentences.chinese: 英语有大量的合成词和派生词。

sentences.english: When you come across new words in reading, sometimes you may not consult dictionaries for them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在阅读中碰到生词，有时候你可以不查词典。

sentences.english: Use a yellow marker for new words.
sentences.chinese: 如遇到生词请用记号笔标出。

sentences.english: Today I can still remember the new words, but tomorrow I'll forget most of them.
sentences.chinese: 今天我还能记住的生词，但明天就忘得七七八八了。

sentences.english: This word is a derivative. Can you point out its root?
sentences.chinese: 这是个派生词，你能指出它的词根吗？

sentences.english: You can find all the new words in the vocabulary of the text.
sentences.chinese: 你能在课文的词汇表中找到所有的生词。

sentences.english: Then just click the mouse, the Shengci enters our personal Shengci table.
sentences.chinese: 这时只要按下鼠标，该生词就进入我们的个人生词表。

sentences.english: Then just click the mouse, the Shengci enters our personal Shengci table.
sentences.chinese: 这时只要按下鼠标，该生词就进入我们的个人生词表。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 is with the prefix "a" analysis of derivative word recognition.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是对带前缀“阿”的派生词的识别分析。

definition: (of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
